mil.nga.giat.geowave.adapter.raster.adapter

Class GridCoverageWritable

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.adapter.raster.adapter.GridCoverageWritable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public class GridCoverageWritable
extends Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    This class is used by GridCoverageDataAdapter to persist GridCoverages. The adapter has information regarding the sample model and color model so all that is necessary to persist is the buffer and the envelope.
